title.value: Data Standards Wales Document Attribute Value Domain

description.value: This extension carries the specific domain to which the value of the document attribute belongs.

purpose.value: Some document attributes contain different sets of values for a pre-defined set of domains. In this case, the value domain provides the context for the value, to provide an unambiguous meaning.
